name: Endless WoodRunner by Light Sita
description:
A lonely creature must do his best to escape a warping black hole eating off their universe. Stay on your path as much as you can, but beware of incoming enemies that will try to push you towards the purple black hole, otherwise you'll be sucked in and it'll be game over.

SPACE - Jump

(If you press space as quickly as possible, you can double jump, though you will find out that it'll give a huge disadvantage.)

Q - Power-Up Boost

(only usable when the red power meter is full, and only executable once)

(If you collect a red power-up shard collectible while the power meter is full, your special move will become unusable, use it wisely)
